entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Pembroke
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:47 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pembroke 08:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: 0.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 0.2°C
Wind: E 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain. High zero with temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy or rain. Local blowing snow late this afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. Wind becoming south 30 gusting to 50 late this afternoon. High zero with temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 08:26 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 08:26 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 08:26 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
